subtitle: This dish makes a good main meal, served with mixed vegetables; or a lighter meal when served with crusty bread.

method.text: Heat the oil, add the garlic and onion. Fry gently for 5 to 6 min. Add the tomatoes and pepper slices and cook for 5 min.
Fill the inside of each mackerel with the mixture. If there is any left over, place this under the fish. Season the fish.
Bake for 30 min. If you like a fairly crisp skin, do not cover the dish; if you prefer a softer and moister skin then cover with foil or a lid.

title: Spanish mackerel
